FeOpt.longname: Fe threshold in uptake ratio computations

NOpt.longname: N threshold in uptake ratio computations

Nfixer.longname: Flag set to true if autotroph fixes nitrogen

PCref_per_day.longname: Maximum C-spec growth rate at Tref

POpt.longname: PO4 threshold in uptake ratio computations

Qp_fixed.longname: P/C ratio when using fixed P/C ratios

SiOpt.longname: Si threshold in uptake ratio computations

exp_calcifier.longname: Flag set to true if autotroph explicitly handles calcification

imp_calcifier.longname: Flag set to true if autotroph implicitly handles calcification

is_carbon_limited.longname: Flag set to true if autotroph is carbon limited

loss_thres.longname: concentration where losses go to zero

loss_thres2.longname: concentration where losses go to zero

silicifier.longname: Flag set to true if autotroph is a silicifier

temp_func_form_opt.longname: Option for the temperature scaling functional form

temp_thres.longname: Temperature where concentration threshold and photosynthesis rate drops

f_zoo_detr.longname: Fraction of zoo losses to detrital

graze_doc.longname: Routing of grazed term, remainder goes to dic

graze_poc.longname: Routing of grazed term, remainder goes to dic

graze_zoo.longname: Routing of grazed term, remainder goes to dic

lname.longname: Long name of the grazing relationship

sname.longname: Short name of the grazing relationship

z_umax_0_per_day.longname: Max zoo growth rate at tref

loss_thres.longname: Zoo concentration where losses go to zero

temp_func_form_opt.longname: Option for the temperature scaling functional form

Jint_Ctot_thres_molpm2pyr.longname: MARBL will abort if abs(Jint_Ctot) exceeds this threshold

PON_bury_coeff.longname: Scale factor for burial of PON

auto_mort2_exp.longname: Value of power loss exponent for autotrophs

bftt_dz_sum_thres.longname: MARBL will abort if abs(1 - sum(bot_flux_to_tend)) exceeds this threshold

bury_coeff_rmean_timescale_years.longname: Running mean time scale for bury coefficients

caco3_bury_thres_depth.longname: Threshold depth for CaCO3 burial when opt = 'fixed_depth'

caco3_bury_thres_omega_calc.longname: omega calcite threshold for CaCO3 burial when opt = 'omega_calc'

caco3_bury_thres_opt.longname: Option of threshold of CaCO3 burial

ciso_fract_factors.longname: Option for which biological fractionation calculation to use

ciso_lsource_sink.longname: Control which portions of the carbon isotope code are executed (useful for debugging)

f_graze_CaCO3_remin.longname: Fraction of spCaCO3 grazing which is remineralized in zooplankton guts

gQ_Fe_kFe_thres.longname: Fe:kFe ratio threshold in uptake ratio computations

gQ_Si_kSi_thres.longname: Si:kSi ratio threshold in uptake ratio computations

labio_derivative_diags.longname: Control whether derivative diagnostics are computed in abiotic surface flux (useful for Newton-Krylov)

ladjust_bury_coeff.longname: Control if bury coefficients are adjusted (rather than constant)

lcheck_forcing.longname: Control whether consistency checks are performed on forcing input (useful for debugging)

lcompute_nhx_surface_emis.longname: Control if NHx emissions are computed

lecovars_full_depth_tavg.longname: If .false., MARBL will recommend truncating the column for some diagnostics

lflux_gas_co2.longname: Control which portions of code are executed (useful for debugging)

lflux_gas_o2.longname: Control which portions of code are executed (useful for debugging)

lo2_consumption_scalef.longname: Apply o2_consumption_scalef to o2 consumption (and request it as a forcing)

lp_remin_scalef.longname: Apply p_remin_scalef to particulate remin (and request it as a forcing)

lsource_sink.longname: Control which portions of code are executed (useful for debugging)

lvariable_NtoC.longname: Control if NtoC ratios in autotrophs vary

lvariable_PtoC.longname: Control if PtoC ratios in autotrophs vary

o2_sf_o2_range_hi.longname: o2_scalefactor is applied to diss length scales for O2 less than this

o2_sf_o2_range_lo.longname: o2_scalefactor is constant for O2 less than this

o2_sf_val_lo_o2.longname: o2_scalefactor constant for O2 less than o2_sf_o2_range_lo

parm_CaCO3_gamma.longname: CaCO3 gamma (fraction of production -> hard subclass)

parm_FeLig_scavenge_rate0.longname: Scavenging base rate for bound iron

parm_Fe_bioavail.longname: Fraction of Fe flux that is bioavailable

parm_Fe_desorption_rate0.longname: Desorption rate for scavenged Fe from particles

parm_Lig_degrade_rate0.longname: Fe-binding ligand bacterial degradation base rate coefficient

parm_Lig_scavenge_rate0.longname: Scavenging base rate for bound ligand

parm_SiO2_gamma.longname: SiO2 gamma (fraction of production -> hard subclass)

parm_f_prod_sp_CaCO3.longname: Fraction of sp production as CaCO3 production

parm_init_POC_bury_coeff.longname: Initial scale factor for burial of POC, PON

parm_init_POP_bury_coeff.longname: Initial scale factor for burial of POP

parm_init_bSi_bury_coeff.longname: Initial scale factor for burial of bSi

parm_labile_ratio.longname: Fraction of loss to DOC that routed directly to DIC

parm_o2_min.longname: Minimum O2 needed for production & consumption

particulate_flux_ref_depth.longname: reference depth for particulate flux diagnostics

zoo_mort2_exp.longname: Value of power loss exponent for zooplankton

tracer_restore_vars.longname: Tracer names for tracers that are restored

abio_dic_on.longname: Control whether abiotic carbon tracer module is active

base_bio_on.longname: Control whether the base ecosystem tracer module is active

ciso_on.longname: Control whether CISO tracer module is active
